text: Manafaru is one of the islands of Haa Alif Atoll, Republic of Maldives. It is the northernmost resort in the Maldives. It is a 5-star luxury resort JA Manafaru, since 2014. It is a resort with 84 rooms and seven world-class food and beverage outlets. Several luxury brands have run the island before, including the Beach House (a Waldorf Astoria hotel). ==References== Category:Resorts in the Maldives Category:Islands of the Maldives
title: Manafaru
